item.title: Quick notes of microservice in action
item.description:
This is quick notes of learning Spring microservice in action(2nd edition). To be clearified, Spring-Boot and Spring-Cloud version are little differert from book.

Here are versions used:

  • Spring-Boot version 2.6.13
  • Spring-Cloud version 2021.0.5

item.title: Usage of Hugo Short Codes
item.description: This page shows the usage of hugo shortcodes, especially customized shortcodes.

item.title: What I'v done to customize this blog
item.description: I'v done little work to make my blog a little more 'personal'. Here I mark them down, in case of forgotten.
